description: Police say a 41-year-old man has been detained after three children were approached.
title: Man accused of impersonating police officer
title_page: Man accused of impersonating police officer in Silsden - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested on suspicion of impersonating a police officer.
He was detained after three children, all aged 12, were approached by a man in Bell Square, Silsden, near Keighley, on Friday night, according to West Yorkshire Police.
The man, 41, was also arrested on suspicion of carrying out two assaults, a force spokesperson said.
No injuries were reported, they added, and the man has since been released on bail while enquiries continue.
